description: This file is an HTML document that serves as the frontend interface for a database visualization tool. It includes styles, structure, and embedded JavaScript to load, display, and interact with databases, their tables, and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables and loads tables if expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables associated with a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data rows for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML for data table from fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell data, including expandable objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing cell content for long entries or objects.
